headline: Private Credit’s Cracks Widened Before Turmoil

headline: Warren Buffett-Led Berkshire Hathaway Owns $37 Billion Worth of 1 Stock. Here Are 3 Reasons You Should Buy It Right Now.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway, the massive enterprise with its hand in various industries, also owns a sizable public equities portfolio.  Directed by legendary investor Warren Buffett, the conglomerate has done a remarkable job compounding capital.  Everyday investors can find potential ideas by looking at what the Oracle of Omaha owns.
